title: Authors and Citation

title: Authors and Citation
text: Leccese F (2022). Rduinoiot: Arduino iot-api R client. R package version 0.1.0, https://flavioleccese92.github.io/Rduinoiot/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {Rduinoiot: Arduino iot-api R client},   author = {Flavio Leccese},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://flavioleccese92.github.io/Rduinoiot/}, }

title: Arduino iot-api R client
text: Rduinoiot provides easy way connect Arduino Iot Cloud API R. Functions allow exploit API methods many purposes, manage Arduino devices dashboards access data produced sensors sketches.

title: Arduino iot-api R client
text: can install development version Rduinoiot GitHub :
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("FlavioLeccese92/Rduinoiot")

title: Arduino iot-api R client
code: library(Rduinoiot) # Sys.setenv(ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_ID = 'INSERT CLIENT_ID HERE') # Sys.setenv(ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_SECRET = 'INSERT CLIENT_SECRET HERE')  create_auth_token() #> v Authorization succeeded

what: List things associated to the user
title: Arduino iot-api R client
text: Things associated user account can easily accessed using things_list(). function return detailed information, particular things_id needed access properties.
code: create_auth_token() #> v Authorization succeeded  things_list() #> v Method succeeded #> # A tibble: 4 x 13 #>   created_at          href                   id    name  prope~1 sketc~2 timez~3 #>   <dttm>              <chr>                  <chr> <chr>   <int> <chr>   <chr>   #> 1 2022-08-12 13:49:43 /iot/v1/things/0b18eb~ 0b18~ Smar~       8 7a8e48~ Americ~ #> 2 2022-08-12 18:24:07 /iot/v1/things/60ef77~ 60ef~ Home~       7 87cbfd~ Americ~ #> 3 2022-08-12 21:57:28 /iot/v1/things/b68224~ b682~ Pers~       5 0ef1dc~ Americ~ #> 4 2022-08-12 13:32:16 /iot/v1/things/bc3b27~ bc3b~ Thin~       2 3a558c~ Americ~ #> # ... with 6 more variables: updated_at <dttm>, user_id <chr>, #> #   device_fqbn <chr>, device_id <chr>, device_name <chr>, device_type <chr>, #> #   and abbreviated variable names 1: properties_count, 2: sketch_id, #> #   3: timezone

what: Create Auth Token for Arduino IoT Cloud API — create_auth_token
title: Create Auth Token for Arduino IoT Cloud API — create_auth_token
text: Obtain authorization token using personal client_id client_secret Arduino site page https://cloud.arduino.cc/home/api-keys Official documentation: API Summary

title: Create Auth Token for Arduino IoT Cloud API — create_auth_token
code: create_auth_token(   client_id = Sys.getenv("ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_ID"),   client_secret = Sys.getenv("ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_SECRET"),   ... )

title: Create Auth Token for Arduino IoT Cloud API — create_auth_token
text: client_id client id (default environmental variable ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_ID) client_secret client secret (default environmental variable ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_SECRET) ... Additional parameters needed body POST request: token_url (default: 'https://api2.arduino.cc/iot/v1/clients/token') grant_type (default: 'client_credentials') audience (default: 'https://api2.arduino.cc/iot') content_type (default: 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded')

title: Create Auth Token for Arduino IoT Cloud API — create_auth_token
text: token valid Arduino IoT Cloud API (stored .Rprofile) retrievable getOption('ARDUINO_API_TOKEN')

title: Create Auth Token for Arduino IoT Cloud API — create_auth_token
code: if (FALSE) { # Sys.setenv(ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_ID = 'INSERT CLIENT_ID HERE') # Sys.setenv(ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_SECRET = 'INSERT CLIENT_SECRET HERE')  create_auth_token() }

title: Devices API methods — devices
text: List show devices, events, properties associated user Official documentation: devicesV2List thingsV2Show devicesV2GetEvents

title: Devices API methods — devices
code: devices_list(   serial = NULL,   tags = NULL,   token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN") )  devices_show(device_id, token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN"))  devices_get_events(   device_id,   limit = NULL,   start = NULL,   token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN") )  devices_get_properties(   device_id,   show_deleted = FALSE,   token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN") )

title: Devices API methods — devices
text: serial serial number device  may want filter list (device_id) tags tags  may want filter list token valid token created create_auth_token (either explicitely assigned retrieved via default getOption('ARDUINO_API_TOKEN')) device_id id device (arn associated device) limit number events select start Posixct Date object. Time start selecting events show_deleted TRUE, shows soft deleted properties. Default FALSE

title: Devices API methods — devices
text: tibble showing extensive information devices (related things) associated user

title: Devices API methods — devices
code: if (FALSE) { library(dplyr) Sys.setenv(ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_ID = 'INSERT CLIENT_ID HERE') Sys.setenv(ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_SECRET = 'INSERT CLIENT_SECRET HERE')  create_auth_token()  ### check properties list ### d_list = devices_list() device_id = d_list %>% slice(1) %>% pull(id)  devices_show(device_id = device_id)  ### get device events ### devices_get_events(device_id = device_id)  ### get device properties ### devices_get_properties(device_id = device_id)  }

text: List properties associated given device

code: devices_properties_list(   device_id,   show_deleted = FALSE,   token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN") )

title: Properties (of devices) API methods — devices_properties
text: device_id id device show_deleted TRUE, shows soft deleted properties. Default FALSE token valid token created create_auth_token (either explicitely assigned retrieved via default getOption('ARDUINO_API_TOKEN'))

text: tibble showing information properties given device.

title: Properties (of devices) API methods — devices_properties
code: if (FALSE) { library(dplyr)  Sys.setenv(ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_ID = 'INSERT CLIENT_ID HERE') Sys.setenv(ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_SECRET = 'INSERT CLIENT_SECRET HERE') create_auth_token()  device_id = "fa7ee291-8dc8-4713-92c7-9027969e4aa1"  ### check properties list ### devices_properties_list(device_id = device_id) }

title: Data start Properties (of devices) API methods — devices_properties_timeseries

title: Data start Properties (of devices) API methods — devices_properties_timeseries
text: device_id id device property_id id property start Posixct Date object. time start selecting properties. limit number properties select token valid token created create_auth_token (either explicitely assigned retrieved via default getOption('ARDUINO_API_TOKEN'))

title: Data start Properties (of devices) API methods — devices_properties_timeseries
text: tibble showing time value property given device

title: Data start Properties (of devices) API methods — devices_properties_timeseries
code: if (FALSE) { Sys.setenv(ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_ID = 'INSERT CLIENT_ID HERE') Sys.setenv(ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_SECRET = 'INSERT CLIENT_SECRET HERE') create_auth_token()  device_id = "fa7ee291-8dc8-4713-92c7-9027969e4aa1" property_id = "d1134fe1-6519-49f1-afd8-7fe9e891e778"  devices_properties_timeseries(device_id = device_id, property_id = property_id,  start = "2022-08-20", limit = 10) }

title: Tags (of devices) API methods — devices_tags
text: Upsert (create/update), List Delete tags associated given device Official documentation: devicesV2TagsUpsert devicesV2TagsList devicesV2TagsDelete

title: Tags (of devices) API methods — devices_tags
code: devices_tags_upsert(   device_id,   key,   value,   token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN") )  devices_tags_list(device_id, token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN"))  devices_tags_delete(device_id, key, token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN"))

title: Tags (of devices) API methods — devices_tags
text: device_id id device key key tag (spaces allowed) value value tag (spaces allowed) token valid token created create_auth_token (either explicitely assigned retrieved via default getOption('ARDUINO_API_TOKEN'))

title: Tags (of devices) API methods — devices_tags
text: tibble showing information chosen tag list tags given device

title: Tags (of devices) API methods — devices_tags
code: if (FALSE) { Sys.setenv(ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_ID = 'INSERT CLIENT_ID HERE') Sys.setenv(ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_SECRET = 'INSERT CLIENT_SECRET HERE') create_auth_token()  device_id = "fa7ee291-8dc8-4713-92c7-9027969e4aa1" ### create/modify tag ### devices_tags_upsert(device_id = device_id, key = "1", value = "test")  ### check tags list ### devices_tags_list(device_id = device_id)  ### delete tag ### devices_tags_delete(device_id = device_id, key = "1") }

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: See magrittr::[\%>\%][magrittr::pipe] details.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
code: lhs %>% rhs

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: result calling rhs(lhs).

title: Batch queries API methods — series_batch
text: Returns batch time-series data last data point property given thing (note: API method bugged waiting fixed Arduino team. completeness future developements suggest using ) Official documentation: seriesV2BatchQuery seriesV2BatchQueryRaw seriesV2BatchQueryRawLastValue

title: Batch queries API methods — series_batch
code: series_batch_query(   from,   to,   interval = NULL,   Q,   SeriesLimit = NULL,   token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN") )  series_batch_query_raw(   from,   to,   interval = NULL,   Q,   SeriesLimit = NULL,   token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN") )  series_batch_last_value(   thing_id,   property_id,   token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN") )

title: Batch queries API methods — series_batch
text: Posixct Date object. Get data timestamp >= value Posixct Date object. Get data timestamp < value interval (numeric) Resolutions seconds (seems affect results) Q query. (clear means allows chose amongs properties filling , instance, property.fbf34284-91f0-42be-bbf6-dd46cfb3f1e0) SeriesLimit Maximum number values (seems affect results) token valid token created create_auth_token (either explicitely assigned retrieved via default getOption('ARDUINO_API_TOKEN')) thing_id id thing property_id id property

title: Batch queries API methods — series_batch
text: tibble showing time value properties

title: Batch queries API methods — series_batch
code: if (FALSE) { Sys.setenv(ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_ID = 'INSERT CLIENT_ID HERE') Sys.setenv(ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_SECRET = 'INSERT CLIENT_SECRET HERE')  create_auth_token()  ### series_batch_query ### series_batch_query(from = "2022-08-15", to = "2022-08-22", Q = "property.fbf34284-91f0-42be-bbf6-dd46cfb3f1e0")  ### series_batch_query_raw ### series_batch_query_raw(from = "2022-08-15", to = "2022-08-22", Q = "property.fbf34284-91f0-42be-bbf6-dd46cfb3f1e0")  ### series_batch_last_value ### thing_id = "b6822400-2f35-4d93-b3e7-be919bdc5eba" property_id = "fbf34284-91f0-42be-bbf6-dd46cfb3f1e0"  series_batch_last_value(thing_id = thing_id, property_id = property_id) }

title: Things API methods — things
text: Create, Update, List, Show Delete properties associated given thing Official documentation: thingsV2Create thingsV2Update thingsV2List thingsV2Show thingsV2Delete

title: Things API methods — things
code: things_create(   device_id = NULL,   thing_id = NULL,   name = NULL,   properties = NULL,   timezone = NULL,   force = FALSE,   token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN") )  things_update(   device_id = NULL,   thing_id = NULL,   name = NULL,   properties = NULL,   timezone = NULL,   force = FALSE,   token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN") )  things_list(   device_id = NULL,   thing_id = NULL,   show_deleted = FALSE,   show_properties = FALSE,   tags = NULL,   token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN") )  things_show(   thing_id,   show_deleted = FALSE,   token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN") )  things_delete(thing_id, force = FALSE, token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN"))

title: Things API methods — things
text: device_id id device (arn associated device) thing_id id thing name friendly name thing properties tibble following columns (see things_properties_create) name (required) friendly name property permission (required) permission property (READ_ONLY READ_WRITE allowed) type (required) type property (see details exhaustive list values) update_strategy (required) update strategy property value (ON_CHANGE TIMED allowed) max_value (optional, numeric) Maximum value property min_value (optional, numeric) Minimum value property persist (optional, logic) TRUE, data persist timeseries database tag (optional, numeric) integer id property update_parameter (optional, numeric) update frequency seconds, amount property change order trigger update variable_name (character) sketch variable name property timezone time zone name. Check get_timezone list valid names. (default: America/New_York) force (logical)  TRUE, detach device thing, attach thing. case deletion, TRUE, hard delete thing. Default FALSE token valid token created create_auth_token (either explicitely assigned retrieved via default getOption('ARDUINO_API_TOKEN')) show_deleted (logical) TRUE, shows soft deleted things. Default FALSE show_properties (logical) TRUE, returns things properties, last values. Default FALSE tags tags  may want filter list

title: Things API methods — things
text: tibble showing information chosen thing list thing current user

title: Things API methods — things
code: if (FALSE) { library(dplyr)  Sys.setenv(ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_ID = 'INSERT CLIENT_ID HERE') Sys.setenv(ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_SECRET = 'INSERT CLIENT_SECRET HERE') create_auth_token()  ### create thing ### things_create(name = "test")  ### check things list ### t_list = things_list() thing_id = t_list %>% filter(name == "test") %>% pull(id)  things_show(thing_id = thing_id)  ### update thing ### properties = tibble(name = c("test1", "test2"), permission = rep("READ_ONLY", 2), type = rep("FLOAT", 2), update_strategy = rep("ON_CHANGE", 2), update_parameter = rep(10, 2))  things_update(thing_id = thing_id, name = "test_update", properties = properties)  ### delete thing ### things_delete(thing_id = thing_id) }

title: Properties (of things) API methods — things_properties
text: Create, Update, List, Show Delete properties associated given thing Official documentation: propertiesV2Create propertiesV2Update propertiesV2List propertiesV2Show propertiesV2Delete

title: Properties (of things) API methods — things_properties
code: things_properties_create(   thing_id,   name,   permission,   type,   update_strategy,   ...,   token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN") )  things_properties_update(   thing_id,   property_id,   name,   permission,   type,   update_strategy,   ...,   token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN") )  things_properties_list(   thing_id,   show_deleted = FALSE,   token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN") )  things_properties_show(   thing_id,   property_id,   token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN") )  things_properties_delete(   thing_id,   property_id,   token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN") )

title: Properties (of things) API methods — things_properties
text: thing_id id thing name friendly name property permission permission property (READ_ONLY READ_WRITE allowed) type type property (see details exhaustive list values) update_strategy update strategy property value (ON_CHANGE TIMED allowed) ... Optional parameters things_properties_create: max_value (numeric) Maximum value property min_value (numeric) Minimum value property persist (logic) TRUE, data persist timeseries database tag (numeric) integer id property update_parameter (numeric) update frequency seconds, amount property change order trigger update variable_name (character) sketch variable name property token valid token created create_auth_token (either explicitely assigned retrieved via default getOption('ARDUINO_API_TOKEN')) property_id id property show_deleted TRUE, shows soft deleted properties. Default FALSE

title: Properties (of things) API methods — things_properties
text: tibble showing information chosen property list properties given thing

title: Properties (of things) API methods — things_properties
code: if (FALSE) { library(dplyr)  Sys.setenv(ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_ID = 'INSERT CLIENT_ID HERE') Sys.setenv(ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_SECRET = 'INSERT CLIENT_SECRET HERE') create_auth_token()  thing_id = "b6822400-2f35-4d93-b3e7-be919bdc5eba"  ### create property ### things_properties_create(thing_id = thing_id, name = "test",  permission = "READ_ONLY", type = "FLOAT", update_strategy = "ON_CHANGE", update_parameter = 10)  ### check properties list ### p_list = things_properties_list(thing_id = thing_id, show_deleted = FALSE) property_id = p_list %>% filter(name == "test") %>% pull(id)  things_properties_show(thing_id = thing_id, property_id = property_id)  ### update property ### things_properties_update(thing_id = thing_id, property_id = property_id, name = "test_update", permission = "READ_ONLY", type = "FLOAT", update_strategy = "ON_CHANGE", update_parameter = 10)  ### delete property ### things_properties_delete(thing_id = thing_id, property_id = property_id) }

what: Data from Properties (of things) API methods — things_properties_timeseries
title: Data from Properties (of things) API methods — things_properties_timeseries
text: Get numerical property's historic data binned specified time interval (note: total number data points greater 1000 otherwise result truncated) Official documentation: propertiesV2Timeseries

title: Data from Properties (of things) API methods — things_properties_timeseries
code: things_properties_timeseries(   thing_id,   property_id,   from = NULL,   to = NULL,   interval = NULL,   desc = NULL,   token = getOption("ARDUINO_API_TOKEN") )

title: Data from Properties (of things) API methods — things_properties_timeseries
text: thing_id id thing property_id id property Posixct Date object. Get data timestamp >= value (default: 2 weeks ago, min: 1842-01-01, max: 2242-01-01) Posixct Date object. Get data timestamp < value (default: now, min: 1842-01-01, max: 2242-01-01) interval (numeric) Binning interval seconds (defaut: smallest possible value compatibly limit 1000 data points response) desc (logic) Whether data's ordering (time) descending. Default FALSE token valid token created create_auth_token (either explicitely assigned retrieved via default getOption('ARDUINO_API_TOKEN'))

title: Data from Properties (of things) API methods — things_properties_timeseries
text: tibble showing time value property given device

title: Data from Properties (of things) API methods — things_properties_timeseries
code: if (FALSE) { Sys.setenv(ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_ID = 'INSERT CLIENT_ID HERE') Sys.setenv(ARDUINO_API_CLIENT_SECRET = 'INSERT CLIENT_SECRET HERE') create_auth_token()  thing_id = "b6822400-2f35-4d93-b3e7-be919bdc5eba" property_id = "d1134fe1-6519-49f1-afd8-7fe9e891e778"  things_properties_timeseries(thing_id = thing_id, property_id = property_id, desc = FALSE, interval = 60, from = "2022-08-20") }
